Title: Requires telegraph and telephone corporations to obtain permits to perform work within a county road right of way
Summary: Requires telegraph and telephone corporations to obtain permits to perform work within a county road right-of-way.
LawCode: Amd ยง136, Hway L; amd ยง27, Transp Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law and the transportation corporations law, in relation to requiring the issuance of permits to telegraph and telephone corporations for work within a county road right of way
